text: No food stalls are open anywhere!

Oh, I see. You suddenly pulled me along,
so I thought something was up. You wanted to eat?

That's right... I wanted Producer-san
to buy for me because I don't have my wallet.

Haha... That's fine,
but if the stalls aren't open...
No food stalls, and I lost... It's not a good day...

...That was surprising. The other girls doing
their dance routines during the live show.

...No. I've already said what I needed
to say to Asahi earlier.

I just want to say
thank you for sticking it out.

Even if you lost,
it doesn't mean the end of being an "idol".
It's only just begun, and there's still a long way to go.

I think there are still some shops open over there.
It might be a bit of a walk, but shall we check it out?
